General.Name: Bombay Dyeing & Mfg Company Limited
General.Description: The Bombay Dyeing and Manufacturing Company Limited produces and sells polyester staple fiber products in India. It operates through Real Estate, Polyester, and Retail/Textile segments. The company is also involved in the manufacture of textile grade PET chips; and retail of textiles. In addition, it develops real estate properties, such as residences, offices, hotels, serviced apartments, hospitals, schools, and retail facilities. The company exports its products to Europe, North and South America, the Middle East, Africa, and Asia. The Bombay Dyeing and Manufacturing Company Limited was incorporated in 1879 and is headquartered in Mumbai, India.
